name: Diablada
skill: Restores 969/1189 HP to all allies; increases targets' speed by 30%/37% for a limited time.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a traditional dance performed in some areas. The concept for the dance is a devil born to the Virgin Mary, but it's actually a combination of many different dances. Since becoming a spirit, he spends every waking minute trying to come up with new dances. He was traveling the world in search of new trends when he heard that several pop stars would be holding a huge concert.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 19/04/17- 10/05/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 07/05/17 - 10/05/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases chance of double Voting Slip drop by 33% during the "Spirit Idol Competition" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 19/04/17- 10/05/17
◦ He was previously named Diablata

summon: "I've got an idea for a special dance we could perform together..."
